Each house represents a different part, or
function, of the Nouns Ecosystem. The houses
are labelled according to this! You can walk
around, enter a house, and find stuff in there.

This is an game-like UI built for
Nouns which serves as an alternative to a
traditional website UI. It allows for a more
engaging, playful way to transmit information!
Hi! Welcome to the Nouns Game!
This is an alternative, game-like frontend UI
for the main Nouns website, www.nouns.wtf .
In other words, anything you can do on the
main nouns website, like bidding, voting,
and accessing info and resource on Nouns, you
can do on here, but in an interactive web game!
What brings you to Nouns Game today?
Cool, welcome! Would you like to go to the
'School' to learn about Nouns, or would you
like to go on a quest that teaches you about
Nouns in a more interactive way?

Lil Nouns governance in Nouns Game!
You're probably wondering how to get a Noun!
Nouns are auctioned off every day to the
highest bidder. Since you can bid on a Noun on
www.nouns.wtf, you can also bid on one here!
When someone wins the Auction, the ETH is
transferred from the winner's wallet to the
Treasury. That's how the treasury gets funded!
Cool, now you understand how proposals and

Now, there are these things called sub-DAOs at
Nouns, basically, they are smaller projects
within the Nouns ecosystem that copy the exact
There are a lot of sub-DAOs! All with their
Here in Nouns Game, there are two sub-DAOs
represented: Lil Nouns, and Gnars Dao.
Lil Nouns are just like Nouns, but 'Lil'!
Gnars is an extreme-sport focused sub-DAO.
Which one would you like to visit?

Congratulations on completing the Nouns Quest.
Your efforts are commendable! Why don't you go
check out the School for more resources?
For instance, a great way to get involved is by
submittin a Candidate. Proposals can be created
by anyone, and if your Candidate receives
enough votes, it becomes a Proposal.
You can also bid on a Lil Noun or a Gnar, or
any of the other sub-DAOs' NFTs, for the
ability to vote on proposals. Not everyone has
enough ETH lying around to bid on a Noun!
Also, be sure to engage with the community
on Twitter, Discord, and Farcaster. There are
active Nouns communities in all of these
places, and you can contribute and collaborate!
Hi, I hope you are enjoying the Nouns Game and
getting involved! To interact with anything, go
into the houses, or go to www.nouns.wtf .
Check back here for more updates!
I think this is the wilderness, I want to go
